get.description: get balance of wallet address in chain

post.description: transfer money to neighboring chains(same wallet address,different chain)

taget_chain.description: miner of chain,0 mean equal trans chain,or neighboring chains

energy.description: tip to miners.if app will write database,need more energy

get.description: get block info.if not query,will get the last block info

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: block id, used when key null.

post.description: post transaction data or block data

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: the key of transaction or block

parameters.name: broadcast
parameters.description: broadcast the data to other node

parameters.name: raw
parameters.description: if true,will return raw data, or return json(include hex data and data deadline)

parameters.name: pre_key
parameters.description: pre_key, if null,will return first key

key.description: next data key, if not next,not this item
